document_data.title: Wild Things
document_data.author: [[Grant Boucher]], [[David Martin]], [[Christopher Mortika]] and [[John Terra]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Wild Things''''' was a booklet that was bundled with the ''[[Wilderness Survival Guide]]'' as the "Limited Edition" of that sourcebook, mainly as a way to get rid of unsold stock.

Table of Contents:
*[[Ettercap]]s and [[Spider]]s
*[[Manticore]]s and [[Griffon]]s
*[[White dragon|White Dragon]]
*[[Orc]]s, [[Orog]]s, and [[Half-orc|Half-Orcs]]
*[[Red dragon|Red Dragon]]
*[[Wemic]]s, [[Lamia]], and [[Thri-kreen|Thri-Kreen]]
*[[Troll]]s and [[Centaur]]s
*Bandits and [[Storm giant|Storm Giants]]
